rules.fullName: Alert to the new opt owner when opt owner change via mobile
Auto Loan%3A When field RTL_AL_BlueBook%5F%5Fc is updated
rules.description: When field RTL_AL_BlueBook__c is change then workflow get blue book data from AL Blue Book Object.
rules.formula: OR( AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(RTL_AL_BlueBook__c) ), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(RTL_AL_BlueBook__c)) ) )

rules.description: Stamp the created information
Stamp the created information

rules.fullName: Non-Credit %3A Update Record type when Issued from Host

criteriaItems.value: Issued by centralize,Issued by Insurance,Issued by Branch

rules.description: Opportunity: Stamp User, Zone, Region when new record or change owner
rules.formula: AND( OR( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name ,"Credit"),CONTAINS( RecordType.Name ,"Non-credit")), OR(ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISNEW()))
AND(RTL_Contact_Address__r.IsActive__c=true,OR( AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(RTL_Contact_Address__c) ), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(RTL_Contact_Address__c)) ) ))

rules.description: This workflow will send email noti to owner of opportunity when it create from Channel OLAP.

Stamp date to field submit date when oppty stage change to Submitted...
rules.formula: AND( ISBLANK( Submit_Date__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submit to Credit Process"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to Insurance"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to TPT"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to Branch"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted to e-onBoarding") ) )

rules.description: Opportunity : Stamp Original Complete Date = Expected complate date
